title: Part a.
stimulusHtml:
4 points

One point each:

  • AD increases because net investment is a component of AD

  • Capital stock increases as a result of net investment

  • Long-run aggregate supply increases (shifts to the right) with the increase in capital stock.

  • Output increases because aggregate demand and long-run aggregate supply both increase

title: Part b.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

The production possibilities curve shifts outward because there has been an increase in the capital stock.
descriptions:
No point earned.

The production possibilities curve shifts outward because there has been an increase in the capital stock.
